meta.max_stay: 3 years initially (extendable up to 6 years for H-1B)
meta.min_funds_requirement: No fixed amount, but salary must meet Prevailing Wage

documents.title: Form I-797 (Approval Notice)
documents.description: Original Notice of Action (I-797B) showing approval of the petition.

documents.title: Form I-129 Copy
documents.description: Copy of the Petition for a Nonimmigrant Worker filed by your employer.

documents.title: LCA (Labor Condition Application)
documents.description: Certified LCA from the Department of Labor (ETA Form 9035).

documents.title: Education Evaluation
documents.description: Critical: Evaluation proving your degree is directly relevant to the job role (New Rule Jan 2025).

steps_flow.title: Employer Files LCA
steps_flow.description: Employer submits Labor Condition Application to DOL.

steps_flow.title: Employer Files Petition
steps_flow.description: Employer files Form I-129 with USCIS (and pays fees).

steps_flow.title: USCIS Approval
steps_flow.description: Receive Form I-797 Notice of Action upon approval.

steps_flow.title: Complete DS-160
steps_flow.description: Fill the online visa application form.

steps_flow.title: Interview
steps_flow.description: Attend interview at US Consulate with I-797 and other docs.
